title: VMware Workstation 10.0.7 Build 2844087 [Eng] + Keygen-AppzDam
description:
For more info visit : appzdam.net

Winner of more than 50 industry awards, VMware Workstation is recognized for its broad operating system support, rich user experience, a comprehensive feature set and high performance. VMware Workstation is designed for professionals that rely on virtual machines to get their job done.

Features :

Take Your Productivity to the Next Level
- Run applications on multiple operating systems including Linux, Windows and more at the same time on the same PC without rebooting.
- Evaluate and test new operating systems, applications and patches in an isolated environment.
- Demonstrate complex software applications on a single laptop in a repeatable, reliable manner.
- Consolidate multiple computers running web servers, database servers, etc. onto a single machine.
- Build reference architectures for evaluation before deploying into production.
- Simply drag and drop to move your virtual machines from your PC to vSphere, or the cloud.

Access Anytime, Anywhere
Seamlessly access all of the virtual machines you need, regardless of where they reside.
- Remotely connect to virtual machines running on another instance of VMware Workstation, or on VMware vSphere.
- WorkstationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s web interface lets you access local and server hosted virtual machines from your PC, smartphone, tablet or any device with a modern browser. No Plugins necessary.
and much more...

Take Windows 8.1 to the Next Level
Unity mode has been enhanced to seamlessly work with Windows 8.1 UI changes. Workstation 10 can now convert a Windows 8.1 physical PC to a virtual machine.

State of the Art Performance
- Support for 16 vCPUs, 8 TB SATA disks and 64GB of RAM
- New Virtual SATA disk controller
- Now supporting 20 virtual networks
- USB3 streams support for faster file copying
- Improved application and Windows VM startup times
- SSD Pass through

What's New :

Superior Unity mode provides transparent support for changes in the user interface Windows 8.1. Now 10 Workstation can convert a physical machine running Windows 8.1 in a virtual machine.
Highest Productivity
Supports up to 16 virtual CPUs, SATA drives of 8 TB and up to 64 GB of RAM

The new virtual disk controller SATA

Now with support for 20 virtual networks

Support for streaming via USB 3 to speed up file

Reducing the time to launch applications and Windows virtual machines

SSD-drives with support for through-transmission
Increased manageability
Create virtual machines with limited access and validity. Included virtual machine sends a request to the server at regular intervals, while maintaining the current system time in the policy file of the virtual machine with restricted access as a last reliable timestamps.
The tablet in a virtual machine
An industry first virtual sensors tablet provides virtual machines running on the tablet, the benefits of an acceleration sensor, gyroscope, compass and even the ambient light sensor.
The best method of operation
Set up multiple monitors - 2, 3 or 4 - has never been easier.

VMware-KVM provides a new interface to use multiple virtual machines
